article_title: Editorial: Medicare for all really is 'the only answer'
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Partly to mostly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 83F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy this evening. Scattered thunderstorms developing after midnight. Low 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

article_metadata.description: We will honor the memory of Dr. Quentin Young by continuing to push for single-payer health care.
article_metadata.author: Cap Times editorial
